ticket.tag: active_model human_attribute_name i18n rails3 rails3.0.2 rails3.0.3
ticket.title: human_attribute_name scopes translations differently for nested classes since rails 3.0.2
ticket.original-body:
Calling @@@ Mss::Units::Absence::Search.human_attribute_name(:x) @@@
seeks for translation key:
@@@ activemodel.attributes.mss/units/absence/search.x @@@
on Rails 3.0.1
but for @@@ activemodel.attributes.mss.units.absence.search.x @@@ on Rails 3.0.2 and 3.0.3
This is due to changes in : GEM_HOME/gems/activemodel-3.0.2/lib/active_model/translation.rb
The changelog states that: @@@ *Rails 3.0.2 (November 15, 2010)*
* No changes @@@
so i believe that it was not intentional.
ticket.latest-body:
Calling @@@ Mss::Units::Absence::Search.human_attribute_name(:x) @@@
seeks for translation key:
@@@ activemodel.attributes.mss/units/absence/search.x @@@
on Rails 3.0.1
but for @@@ activemodel.attributes.mss.units.absence.search.x @@@ on Rails 3.0.2 and 3.0.3
This is due to changes in : GEM_HOME/gems/activemodel-3.0.2/lib/active_model/translation.rb
The changelog states that: @@@ *Rails 3.0.2 (November 15, 2010)*
* No changes @@@
so i believe that it was not intentional.
ticket.original-body-html:
Calling

Mss::Units::Absence::Search.human_attribute_name(:x)

seeks for translation key:

activemodel.attributes.mss/units/absence/search.x

on Rails 3.0.1

but for

activemodel.attributes.mss.units.absence.search.x
on Rails 3.0.2 and 3.0.3

This is due to changes in :
GEM_HOME/gems/activemodel-3.0.2/lib/active_model/translation.rb

The changelog states that:

Rails 3.0.2 (November 15, 2010)
  • No changes





so i believe that it was not intentional.

version.body: These Hinduism courses will acquaint tiffany charms on salestudents with Veda, Bhagavad-Gita, Upanishads, epics and Puranas, tantric and bhakti traditions, concept of salvation, philosophical traditions, etc.cheap tiffany jewellery On the oral exam, students are supposed to be able to explain cited Sanskrit terms. It is included in Master of Theology and Religious Studies and Cheap Tiffany Charmssome other programs. Katholieke Universiteit Leuven, founded by Pope Martin V, has about 37000 students from all over the world and offers 120 postgraduate academic programs with revenue of tiffany necklacesabout $890 million. Mark Waer is the Rector.

It is included in Master of Theology and Religious Studies and Cheap Tiffany Charmssome other programs.

Katholieke Universiteit Leuven, founded by Pope Martin V, has about 37000 students from all over the world and offers 120 postgraduate academic programs with revenue of tiffany necklacesabout $890 million. Mark Waer is the Rector.

version.body:
I was just searching for this bug too and you gave me the answer. I'm running Rails 3.0.3.
Problem is.. what happens now if i corrent my locales to this new design, then it will be considered a bug and "fixed"? :(
version.body-html:
I was just searching for this bug too and you gave me the answer.
I'm running Rails 3.0.3.

Problem is.. what happens now if i corrent my locales to this new design, then it will be considered a bug and "fixed"?
:(
version.tag: active_model human_attribute_name i18n rails3 rails3.0.2 rails3.0.3
version.title: human_attribute_name scopes translations differently for nested classes since rails 3.0.2

version.body:
to fix this bug try redesign locale files to structure for namespaced models
### Example
class **Hotels::Period** config/locales/pl/models/hotels/period.yml
@@@ yml pl: activerecord: models: hotels: period: 'okres' attributes: hotels: period: name: 'nazwa' start_date: 'początek' end_date: 'koniec' days: 'dni' discount: 'zniżka' @@@
version.body-html:
to fix this bug try redesign locale files to
structure for namespaced models

Example

class Hotels::Period
config/locales/pl/models/hotels/period.yml

pl:
  activerecord:
    models:
      hotels:
        period: 'okres'
    attributes:
      hotels:
        period:
          name:                  'nazwa'
          start_date:            'początek'
          end_date:              'koniec'
          days:                  'dni'
          discount:              'zniżka'
version.tag: active_model human_attribute_name i18n rails3 rails3.0.2 rails3.0.3
version.title: human_attribute_name scopes translations differently for nested classes since rails 3.0.2

version.body: My temporary workaround is : @@@ ActiveModel::Name.class_eval do def i18n_key @fixed_i18n_key ||= ActiveSupport::Inflector.underscore(self).to_sym end end @@@
version.body-html:
My temporary workaround is :

ActiveModel::Name.class_eval do
 def i18n_key
  @fixed_i18n_key ||= ActiveSupport::Inflector.underscore(self).to_sym
 end
end
version.tag: active_model human_attribute_name i18n rails3 rails3.0.2 rails3.0.3
version.title: human_attribute_name scopes translations differently for nested classes since rails 3.0.2

version.body:
nice work ;) i`ve another interesting problem with i18n on forms helpers
@@@ haml = form_for(@period, :url => period_path(@period), :html => { :multipart => true, :method => :put }) do |f| = f.label :name, :class => 'form-label size-60 fl-space2' @@@
autotranslate :name doesn't work with namespaced models :(
version.body-html:
nice work ;)
ive another interesting problem with i18n on forms helpers

  = form_for(@period, :url => period_path(@period), :html => { :multipart => true, :method => :put }) do |f|
    = f.label :name, :class => 'form-label size-60 fl-space2'

autotranslate :name doesn't work with namespaced models :(
version.tag: active_model human_attribute_name i18n rails3 rails3.0.2 rails3.0.3
version.title: human_attribute_name scopes translations differently for nested classes since rails 3.0.2

version.body: autotranslate :name ??

version.body: A thousand-li journey is started by taking the first step.Strength alone knows conflict, weakness is below even defeat, and is born vanquished. It's an ugg classic cardy tall article by Tom Reese in yesterday's Pacific Northwest Magazine about the Lake Washington wetlands near Seattle's Arboretum. I actually found myself ugg boots classic cardy gray strangely upset by the article. Not only because he's describing a place I've loved for ugg boots years, but because he so carefully describes the official ugg boots contingency of the natural environment there.Reese takes the bailey ugg boots uk pied-billed grebe as his touchstone, which is a good choice. If you know where to look, you can find the grebe's nest classic argyle uggs resting on the lily pads. It's exposed. It trusts to camoflauge to avoid disturbance. And the argyle ugg boots uk grebes there always make me worry because they're so small and tentative, with ugg boots shop so little to defend themselves. They're the perfect metaphor for our mini ugg boots stewardship of the natural refuges in our cities.Plus, the seventeen photos that mini ugg boots on sale accompany the article online are also astonishingly good. Much better than ordinary uggs ultra boots on sale newspaper shots. But you should go see for yourself.In this article, the good Vietnamese monk tells the story of counseling a young Buddhist woman who had fallen in love with a Catholic man, and was distraught because his family was insisting that she become a Catholic in ultra tall uggs order to marry him. After speaking with her, Thich Nhat Hanh basically gave his ugg classic tall purple blessing for her to enter the church, suggesting that if she continued ugg tall red to do mindfulness work, she could be a Buddhist on the ugg boots cheap inside, even while practicing Catholicism. She thought it over, and her reply is worth considering, as she short black uggs weighs the merits of the two faiths: “[Buddhism is] a tradition that is so embracing, so discount ugg boots classic short tolerant, so open, if I abandon it and turn my back to it, I am not a person of value. [By contrast, Catholicism is] a tradition sundance uggs on sale that is so strict, that has no tolerance, that is not able to understand, how could I formally identify myself sundance uggs sand with it?” ZHC

They're the perfect metaphor for our mini ugg boots stewardship of the natural refuges in our cities.Plus, the seventeen photos that mini ugg boots on sale accompany the article online are also astonishingly good. Much better than ordinary uggs ultra boots on sale newspaper shots. But you should go see for yourself.In this article, the good Vietnamese monk tells the story of counseling a young Buddhist woman who had fallen in love with a Catholic man, and was distraught because his family was insisting that she become a Catholic in ultra tall uggs order to marry him. After speaking with her, Thich Nhat Hanh basically gave his ugg classic tall purple blessing for her to enter the church, suggesting that if she continued ugg tall red to do mindfulness work, she could be a Buddhist on the ugg boots cheap inside, even while practicing Catholicism. She thought it over, and her reply is worth considering, as she short black uggs weighs the merits of the two faiths: “[Buddhism is] a tradition that is so embracing, so discount ugg boots classic short tolerant, so open, if I abandon it and turn my back to it, I am not a person of value. [By contrast, Catholicism is] a tradition sundance uggs on sale that is so strict, that has no tolerance, that is not able to understand, how could I formally identify myself sundance uggs sand with it?” ZHC

It's an ugg classic cardy tall article by Tom Reese in yesterday's Pacific Northwest Magazine about the Lake Washington wetlands near Seattle's Arboretum. I actually found myself ugg boots classic cardy gray strangely upset by the article. Not only because he's describing a place I've loved for ugg boots years, but because he so carefully describes the official ugg boots contingency of the natural environment there.Reese takes the bailey ugg boots uk pied-billed grebe as his touchstone, which is a good choice. If you know where to look, you can find the grebe's nest classic argyle uggs resting on the lily pads. It's exposed. It trusts to camoflauge to avoid disturbance. And the argyle ugg boots uk grebes there always make me worry because they're so small and tentative, with ugg boots shop so little to defend themselves. They're the perfect metaphor for our mini ugg boots stewardship of the natural refuges in our cities.Plus, the seventeen photos that mini ugg boots on sale accompany the article online are also astonishingly good. But you should go see for yourself.In this article, the good Vietnamese monk tells the story of counseling a young Buddhist woman who had fallen in love with a Catholic man, and was distraught because his family was insisting that she become a Catholic in ultra tall uggs order to marry him. After speaking with her, Thich Nhat Hanh basically gave his ugg classic tall purple blessing for her to enter the church, suggesting that if she continued ugg tall red to do mindfulness work, she could be a Buddhist on the ugg boots cheap inside, even while practicing Catholicism. version.body: A thousand-li journey is started by taking the first step.Strength alone knows conflict, weakness is below even defeat, and is born vanquished. It's an ugg classic cardy tall article by Tom Reese in yesterday's Pacific Northwest Magazine about the Lake Washington wetlands near Seattle's Arboretum. I actually found myself ugg boots classic cardy gray strangely upset by the article. Not only because he's describing a place I've loved for ugg boots years, but because he so carefully describes the official ugg boots contingency of the natural environment there.Reese takes the bailey ugg boots uk pied-billed grebe as his touchstone, which is a good choice. If you know where to look, you can find the grebe's nest classic argyle uggs resting on the lily pads. It's exposed. It trusts to camoflauge to avoid disturbance. And the argyle ugg boots uk grebes there always make me worry because they're so small and tentative, with ugg boots shop so little to defend themselves. They're the perfect metaphor for our mini ugg boots stewardship of the natural refuges in our cities.Plus, the seventeen photos that mini ugg boots on sale accompany the article online are also astonishingly good. Much better than ordinary uggs ultra boots on sale newspaper shots. But you should go see for yourself.In this article, the good Vietnamese monk tells the story of counseling a young Buddhist woman who had fallen in love with a Catholic man, and was distraught because his family was insisting that she become a Catholic in ultra tall uggs order to marry him. After speaking with her, Thich Nhat Hanh basically gave his ugg classic tall purple blessing for her to enter the church, suggesting that if she continued ugg tall red to do mindfulness work, she could be a Buddhist on the ugg boots cheap inside, even while practicing Catholicism. She thought it over, and her reply is worth considering, as she short black uggs weighs the merits of the two faiths: “[Buddhism is] a tradition that is so embracing, so discount ugg boots classic short tolerant, so open, if I abandon it and turn my back to it, I am not a person of value. [By contrast, Catholicism is] a tradition sundance uggs on sale that is so strict, that has no tolerance, that is not able to understand, how could I formally identify myself sundance uggs sand with it?” ZHC

After speaking with her, Thich Nhat Hanh basically gave his ugg classic tall purple blessing for her to enter the church, suggesting that if she continued ugg tall red to do mindfulness work, she could be a Buddhist on the ugg boots cheap inside, even while practicing Catholicism. She thought it over, and her reply is worth considering, as she short black uggs weighs the merits of the two faiths: “[Buddhism is] a tradition that is so embracing, so discount ugg boots classic short tolerant, so open, if I abandon it and turn my back to it, I am not a person of value. [By contrast, Catholicism is] a tradition sundance uggs on sale that is so strict, that has no tolerance, that is not able to understand, how could I formally identify myself sundance uggs sand with it?” ZHC

version.body: A thousand-li journey is started by taking the first step.Strength alone knows conflict, weakness is below even defeat, and is born vanquished. It's an ugg classic cardy tall article by Tom Reese in yesterday's Pacific Northwest Magazine about the Lake Washington wetlands near Seattle's Arboretum. I actually found myself ugg boots classic cardy gray strangely upset by the article. Not only because he's describing a place I've loved for ugg boots years, but because he so carefully describes the official ugg boots contingency of the natural environment there.Reese takes the bailey ugg boots uk pied-billed grebe as his touchstone, which is a good choice. If you know where to look, you can find the grebe's nest classic argyle uggs resting on the lily pads. It's exposed. It trusts to camoflauge to avoid disturbance. And the argyle ugg boots uk grebes there always make me worry because they're so small and tentative, with ugg boots shop so little to defend themselves. They're the perfect metaphor for our mini ugg boots stewardship of the natural refuges in our cities.Plus, the seventeen photos that mini ugg boots on sale accompany the article online are also astonishingly good. Much better than ordinary uggs ultra boots on sale newspaper shots. But you should go see for yourself.In this article, the good Vietnamese monk tells the story of counseling a young Buddhist woman who had fallen in love with a Catholic man, and was distraught because his family was insisting that she become a Catholic in ultra tall uggs order to marry him. After speaking with her, Thich Nhat Hanh basically gave his ugg classic tall purple blessing for her to enter the church, suggesting that if she continued ugg tall red to do mindfulness work, she could be a Buddhist on the ugg boots cheap inside, even while practicing Catholicism. She thought it over, and her reply is worth considering, as she short black uggs weighs the merits of the two faiths: “[Buddhism is] a tradition that is so embracing, so discount ugg boots classic short tolerant, so open, if I abandon it and turn my back to it, I am not a person of value. [By contrast, Catholicism is] a tradition sundance uggs on sale that is so strict, that has no tolerance, that is not able to understand, how could I formally identify myself sundance uggs sand with it?” ZHC

After speaking with her, Thich Nhat Hanh basically gave his ugg classic tall purple blessing for her to enter the church, suggesting that if she continued ugg tall red to do mindfulness work, she could be a Buddhist on the ugg boots cheap inside, even while practicing Catholicism. She thought it over, and her reply is worth considering, as she short black uggs weighs the merits of the two faiths: “[Buddhism is] a tradition that is so embracing, so discount ugg boots classic short tolerant, so open, if I abandon it and turn my back to it, I am not a person of value. version.body:
@robert
i had tried to do labels with I18n from http://blog.plataformatec.com.br/2010/02/rails-3-i18n-changes/ but this way doesn`t work
i found answer. 'action_view/helpers/form_helper.rb' lines 890
@@@ ruby p "#{object_name}.#{method_name}" # me puts here I18n.t("helpers.label.#{object_name}.#{method_name}", :default => "").presence
return "hotels_period.name"
@@@
so in locales yml, keys must be like :
pl: helpers: label: hotels_period: name: 'nazwa'
not
hotels: period: name: 'nazwa'
its just another inconsistence ?
version.body-html:
@robert

i had tried to do labels with I18n from http://blog.plataformatec.com.br/2010/02/rails-3-i18n-changes/
but this way doesnt work

i found answer.
'action_view/helpers/form_helper.rb' lines 890

            p "#{object_name}.#{method_name}" # me puts here
            I18n.t("helpers.label.#{object_name}.#{method_name}", :default => "").presence


return "hotels_period.name"

so in locales yml, keys must be like :

pl:
helpers:

label:
  hotels_period:
    name:                  'nazwa'

not

  hotels:
    period:
      name:                  'nazwa'

its just another inconsistence ?
version.tag: active_model human_attribute_name i18n rails3 rails3.0.2 rails3.0.3
version.title: human_attribute_name scopes translations differently for nested classes since rails 3.0.2
